lead_paragraph: Tim Masthay is focusing on his form as Green Bay will try to contain the Bears’ return star, Devin Hester, in Sunday’s N.F.C. championship game at Soldier Field.
snippet: Tim Masthay is focusing on his form as Green Bay will try to contain the Bears’ return star, Devin Hester, in Sunday’s N.F.C. championship game at Soldier Field.
